usa: Disney's Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs became the first full-length animated film.<sup id="cite_ref-160" class="reference">[160]</sup>
The Hatch Act, aimed at corrupt political practices, was signed into law, preventing federal civil servants from campaigning.<sup id="cite_ref-161" class="reference">[161]</sup>
Invasion of Poland: Nazi Germany invaded Poland.[162]
In response to the Poland Campaign, President Roosevelt requested a cash and carry policy to replace the Neutrality Acts.[163]
